parameters.messageText: I try to clean everything up as good as I can, and then I decide to look for a bathroom to try to recompose...
...And maybe clean myself better....
I am not thinking straight. What have I done?

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: There you are!

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Gah!

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Oh shit! Is that blood? Are you okay?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine. This is not my blood. I mean, this is not blood. It is tomato sauce. I accidentaly fell into a Lasagna...

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Ahm... what?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Where is the nearest bathroom?

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: You fell... over a Lasagna? Are you Orika-chan?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Who?

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Nevermind, you'll eventually meet her. There's a bathroom just over there.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Thanks. Can you take me to the dormitories later? I'm not feeling so good.

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Sure! I'll be waiting right here! If you want, we can go to the infirmary.
That actually sound like a good idea. I am really not well.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Okay, I think I may need something to calm me down. Let me just clean myself up a little on the bathroom.

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Sure.
I go to the bathroom as fast as I can, while feeling the tomato sauce running down my legs, inside my pants.
I got to the bathroom. The sterile ambient calms me a little.
I grab some paper towels and go inside a stall to clean me up.
I sit a little bit on the toilet to try to set my mind straight.
Okay. I think I can go now.
As I open the stall door, I see a girl washing her hands on one of the sinks. Shit. Did I enter the women's bathroom?
She raises her head and stare at me, through the looking glass in front of her.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Oh, sorry.
She gives a discreet smile and resumes what she was doing.
I leave the bathroom, a little troubled, but soon all will be over. I need to find Keisuke.
There he is.

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Shall we go then?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Yes, please.
Keisuke starts walking and talking again. I just follow, trying to make a mental map of this place.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: I'll never be able to find anything here.

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Of course you will. Look, that corridor over ther are the dorms. And the infirmary is just ahead.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Ok, I'll try to remember this.
We arrive at the infirmary.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: I think you can leave me now. The dorms are just over there, I won't get lost around here, I guess.

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: Okay man! Make sure you are well for the classes tomorrow. Here, take my number, you can call me if you need anything.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Thanks. Talk to you later then.
Keisuke leaves and I prep...

parameters.imageName: CG - Orika opens the door on me

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Ouch!
A girl slammed the door on my face as I was about to knock on it!

parameters.name: Clumsy Girl
parameters.messageText: Oh! SORRY SORRY SORRY SORRY

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Shit, my nose. Damn it!
She is about to cry. I better say something...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Sorry. It was not your fault...

parameters.name: Clumsy Girl
parameters.messageText: Of course it was.... I'm so so so so sooo sorry...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: It's okay.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: ...I'm Hoshino Orika...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Orika? I think I heard your name already.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Guess, I'm famous around here for being clumsy... I'm always bumping into people or dropping stuff into my dishes.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: No, it was nothing like that... Anyway... I'm here to see the nurse. I'm not feeling too well...
I notice she looking at my waist. I should've changed clothes before coming here...

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Oh, what happened to your pants? Is that tomato sauce?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: No, it's not bloo... wait. IT IS tomato sauce! How did you know?

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Hahaha that happens to me at almost every class from Signoire Escardole.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Let me guess. That's our italian cuisine teacher?
Wonder if he cooked that Lasagna... NO. I need to forget that happened.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Yes! I've spoken to Escardole-sensei already: Tomato sauce is one of the worst kinds of stains.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: It sticks to your clothing like cheese to a hot pan.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: You have to clean it with lemon juice or vinegar. Did you know that?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Oh, no, I didn't! That's a very good tip! Thanks!

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: No problem! I know a lot about removing stains because I'm always dropping stuff on my clothes...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: That happens, as you can see.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Yeah, but even I, being as clumsy as I am, never did THAT to any of my pants. There's too much tomato sauce there...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Oh, bet you never fell into a Lasagna then.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: I did, yes. But not with my... privates... I landed with my face...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Oh... sorry about that...

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: It's okay, I think I grew used to that... Anyway, what was you doing here again?
I completely forgot about what I actually did to the Lasagna.
This girl made me feel a little better. Or was it the door slamming on my head and putting everything in its right place?

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Well, I was feeling a little uneasy, but I think I'm better now. It seems all needed was a door slammed on my face.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Oh... Stop mentioning that...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Sorry. Well, I gotta go, clean up this mess and take a shower.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Sure. Go on then.

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Okay, see you around!

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Cya!
Well, now, if I remember well, the dorms are right over there...
And my room is...
Right here!
I start opening the door with my key when something pushes me inside the door

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Gah!

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Ouch!

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Sorry! Sorry! Oh... Sorry...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: It's okay, but can you please get up?

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Sorry...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Calm down, stop saying 'sorry'

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Oh, sorry.... I mean... Okay... Sorry... Oh shoot...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: What happened?

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: I forgot to ask your name... I'm always forgetting stuff...

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: That's it? I'm Hameru Tabe. Nice to meet you, despite all this fuss haha
I try to laugh to lighten things up.

parameters.name: Orika
parameters.messageText: Hahaha, Hameru Tabe! You are funny! Nice to meet you! Bye!

parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
parameters.messageText: Ahm...
As fast as she came, she is gone.
I close my dorm room, kinda exhausted. I think I'll just take a shower and go to bed.
